nodes.text: "Cohl's teeth" was an expression of surprise used within the galaxy. While attempting to steal the brain of the former thief Zaril from a secret grotto beneath Jabba Desilijic Tiure's palace, the Mirialan beastmaster Dagra Van used the phrase after taking in the vast amount of brains stored by the B'omarr Order.

"Cohl's teeth" was mentioned in Star Wars Adventures: Return to Vader's Castle 4, a comic book written by Cavan Scott and published by IDW Publishing on October 23, 2019. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the similarly-named Arwen Cohl was a Mirialan freedom fighter and well-renowned figure among his people.
